liked_words.Sentence-expression: いつでも気軽に遊びに来て下さい。
liked_words.Sentence-kana: いつでも きがる に あそび に きて ください
liked_words.Sentence-meaning: Please feel free to stop by any time.

liked_words.Sentence-expression: 霧が晴れて視界が開けたね。
liked_words.Sentence-kana: きり が はれて しかい が ひらけた ね
liked_words.Sentence-meaning: The fog has cleared up and visibility has increased.
